nested_items.name: PolicyInJson
nested_items.description: Contains the requested policy document, in JSON format.

nested_items.name: PolicyHash
nested_items.description: Contains the hash value associated with this policy.

nested_items.name: CreateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time at which the policy was created.

nested_items.name: UpdateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time at which the policy was last updated.
